lines.i: Indicator of whether reporter of PCR is the first unit to arrive at the scene

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.84"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11197)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10741)/@code="67481-2" First EMS unit on scene NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10742)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:10743)
NEMSIS Trace: EScene.01
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11197)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10741)/@code="67481-2" First EMS unit on scene NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10742)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:10743)
NEMSIS Trace: EScene.01
